nitf_SubWindow Struct Reference

Sub-window specification structure. More...

#include <SubWindow.h>

Detailed Description

Sub-window specification structure.

The nitf_SubWindow specifies a sub-window. This object is used as an argument to image read and write requests to specify the data requested.

The bandList field specifies the desired bands. Bands are numbered starting with zero and ordered as the bands appear physically in the file. The user must supply one buffer for each requested band. Each buffer must have enough storage for one band of the requested subimage size.

The downsampler determines what downsampling (if any) is performed on this sub-window request. There is no default downsampler. If you just want to perform pixel skipping, call setDownSampler() with a PixelSkip object.
